job_relevance.prompt: Using this paragraph that is about me: {my_summary}, and this job description: {job_posting_summary}, rate the % chance that I may get a call for first interview. Your response should just include a percentage number like 50% and nothing else.

job_summary.prompt: Summarize this job posting object: {jobObject} and give me the object back after adding the following keys and respective values to the object: experience_required (which is total years of experience required), tech_skills_array which is all the tech skills that the job requires. If you were unable to get a value for a key, its value should be 'NA', Share back just the experience_required and tech_skills_array in an object and  nothing else!

demonstrate.prompt: Using the writing style in this paragraph (called my_summary) that is about me: {my_summary}, and this job_description (called job_description): {job_posting_summary}, add some sentences to my_summary to include key skills and keywords from the shared job_description. Share just the added sentences and nothing else!
